column1: ANS.- Data refers to raw facts

column6: or generated. These facts can be numbers
column10: or even just descriptions of things. Data on its own does not have meaning until it is processed
column12: or analyzed to become useful information.

column1: ANS.- A filesystem is a method or structure used by an operating system to organize
column4: and manage data on storage devices such as hard drives
column6: or USB drives. It defines how files and directories (folders) are named
